events.title: DeSantis Inaugurated
events.description: Ron DeSantis becomes Governor of Florida. First budget: $91 billion.

events.title: Mary Mayhew Appointed
events.description: DeSantis taps Mary Mayhew as AHCA Secretary (Chief Medicaid Officer).

events.title: Deloitte Donates to DeSantis
events.description: Deloitte makes $3,000 contribution to Friends of Ron DeSantis.

events.title: COVID Emergency Declared
events.description: DeSantis declares COVID emergency, suspends competitive bidding requirements.

events.title: Tom McCullion 'Let Go'
events.description: Tom McCullion (CONNECT project manager, advising on Deloitte contract) let go from AHCA.

events.title: $600M PPE Scramble Begins
events.description: State attempts $600M in no-bid PPE contracts. Empty warehouses, fake cargo planes.

events.title: DeSantis Calls CONNECT 'Clunker'
events.description: Governor calls Deloitte's CONNECT system 'a clunker,' 'a jalopy,' 'in tatters.'

events.title: Investigation Ordered
events.description: DeSantis orders Inspector General investigation into Deloitte's CONNECT system.

events.title: State Fines Deloitte
events.description: Florida fines Deloitte $8 million for CONNECT failures.

events.title: AHCA Awards Deloitte $135M
events.description: Despite investigation and fine, AHCA awards Deloitte $135M Medicaid data warehouse contract.

events.title: DeSantis: 'I Don't Like It'
events.description: Governor says he would void contract if he could, claims procurement rules tied his hands.

events.title: Mary Mayhew Leaves for Hospital Association
events.description: AHCA Secretary departs to become CEO of Florida Hospital Association.

events.title: DeSantis Signs Audit Law
events.description: Governor signs law requiring audits of emergency spending after 1 year.

events.title: GEO Group Donates $150K
events.description: Private prison company donates $150K to RGA.

events.title: GEO Contract Renewed
events.description: South Bay Correctional contract renewed less than 2 weeks after donation.

events.title: Martha's Vineyard Flights
events.description: Vertol Systems flies ~50 migrants from Texas to Martha's Vineyard.

events.title: Marstiller Resigns
events.description: AHCA Secretary Simone Marstiller resigns day after DeSantis re-election.

events.title: Border 'Emergency' Declared
events.description: DeSantis declares border 'emergency,' suspends competitive bidding. Extended 15 times.

events.title: HB1 Expands Vouchers
events.description: Universal school vouchers signed into law. No income limits.

events.title: $16.4M in 3 Days
events.description: Strategic Digital Services receives $16.4M from 5 agencies in 3 days. No bidding.

events.title: Centene Settlement
events.description: $67M settlement for overbilling. $10M diverted to Hope Florida.

events.title: Hope Florida Scandal Breaks
events.description: NPR reports on developing scandal. House opens investigation.

events.title: Alligator Alcatraz Opens
events.description: $250M+ detention facility in Everglades. Contracts removed from database.

events.title: $6B Missing Contracts Exposed
events.description: Florida Bulldog reveals 719 contracts worth $6B+ missing documentation.

events.title: Grand Jury Convened
events.description: State prosecutors issue subpoenas. Officials questioned on conspiracy, money laundering.

events.title: Voucher Audit Released
events.description: State auditor finds $270M missing for 30,000 students.

events.title: Political Ads Scandal
events.description: Tampa Bay Times reveals $36.2M diverted from healthcare/children to political ads.

events.title: Uthmeier Becomes AG
events.description: James Uthmeier appointed Attorney General while under investigation.
